============
Introduction
============

.. figure:: _static/emulator_mainwindow.png
   :align: center
   :alt: PyBpod's Main window with the Emulator Window opened

   PyBpod's Main window with the Emulator Window opened

This is the documentation for the Emulator plugin for PyBpod (https://pybpod.readthedocs.io/).

The Emulator plugin allows to override inputs and outputs on a
running task protocol.

For further details you can see the :ref:`overview` and the :ref:`usage` pages.
For installation instructions please see the :ref:`installation` page.
